text: Let's go over how to add a promotion
on your LinkedIn profile
using a web browser or mobile app

and share your new job
title with your network.
Open the LinkedIn app on your phone.
Click your profile image,
then click "View Profile."
Scroll down to your experience section
and then click the pencil.

Now find the position or
job you want to update
and click the pencil next to it.
Make sure "Notify network" is enabled.

This will post your
promotion to your feed.
Update any information on this page

that reflects your
promotion, then click "Save."

Now let's go over adding a
promotion from your desktop.

Open your web browser
and go to LinkedIn.com.
Make sure you're logged in to your account
and click your profile image.
Scroll down to your experience section,
then click the pencil.

Now find the position or
job you want to update
and click the pencil next to it.
Make sure "Notify network" is enabled.

This will post your
promotion to your network.
Update any information on this page

that reflects your
promotion, then click "Save."
